item.title: BMO says these dividend growth stocks are poised for outperformance
item.description: Dividend growth stocks are a good way to both protect portfolios during times of volatility and boost performance, according to BMO.

item.title: Netflix earnings are out soon. What Wall Street is really watching
item.description: Wall Street is eager to find out if Netflix's buzzworthy special events led to a big boost in revenue from subscriptions and advertising.

item.title: A Trump meme coin ETF is already in the works

item.title: Correction risks are lingering for market despite Trump optimism
item.description: Investors are decidedly buoyant following President Donald Trump's inauguration, but that could open the market up to some disappointment.

item.title: Defense stock is breaking out on the charts after an assist from a bank upgrade
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the charts in Northrop Grumman.
